tasks.build: deno task build:node && deno task build:web
tasks.build:web: mkdir -p out deno_cache && cd scripts && DENO_DIR=$PWD/../deno_cache deno run --quiet --allow-net --allow-read --allow-env --allow-write bundle-web.ts ../src/mod.ts
tasks.test: deno task test:deno && deno task test:node && deno task test:web
tasks.cache: deno task cache:deno && deno task cache:node
tasks.generate:index: deno run --allow-read --allow-write scripts/generate-index.ts && deno task format
